gate.learning

Class NLPFeaturesList

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.learning.NLPFeaturesList

  • public class NLPFeaturesList
extends Object
    NLP feature list. Read it from a file, update it using the new documents, and write back into the file.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Map<String,Long> featuresList
      the features with ids, can be accessed by multiple threads.
      Map<String,Long> idfFeatures
      Document frequence of each term, useful for document or passage classification
      static String SYMBOLNGARM
      The unique sysmbol used for the N-gram feature.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor, get the two hashtables.

      Update the NLP features from new documents.

      Clear the label list object for another run in evaluation.

      Loading the list from a file.
      void writeListIntoFile(File parentDir, String filename, String tcode)
      Write back the list into the file, with updated information.
      void writeToLM(File parentDir, String filename, int nGram)
      convert the NLP list into Ngram language model and write it into a file.
